terminal.title: terminal
terminal.welcome: Welcome to Vick's interactive terminal. Type 'help' for available commands.
terminal.help_text:
Available commands:
  help          - Show available commands
  ls            - List viewable files
  cat about.md  - View about me
  cat skills.json - View skills
  open resume.pdf - Download resume PDF
  clear         - Clear screen
terminal.not_found: Command not found. Type 'help' for available commands.
